text: Ara yara amadera ayatasamuhe imana eneche tara yakhana tomara kache ase takhana balo -- ''salamuna'ala'ikuma.â€™â€™ Tomadera prabhu tamra nijera upare kartabya tha'orechena karuna, sejan'ya tomadera madhye ye ajnanatabasatah papakarya kare, atahpara tara pare phere o satkaja kare, tabe to tini paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
